_header: The surest way to conquer sin
Subjects: Christ, name of; Christ, prayers to; prayers, for protection; prayers, to Christ; sins, remedies against
_description: On efficacy of praying to Christ to conquer sin — one quatrain

BodDouA314.Transcription:
The sewrest waye to conquer synne& hould the devyll at
                    bayeis ofte on Iesus name to call& ofte to him to praye
BodDouA314.Note:
Follows 6610,
                    written in a hand of the sixteenth century.
